-- | Time in ebeats
--   
--   Time in ebeats. See <a>http://ebeats.org/</a>.
@package ebeats
@version 0.1.0

module Data.Time.Ebeats
newtype Ebeats
Ebeats :: Fixed E2 -> Ebeats
ebeatsTimeValue :: Ebeats -> Fixed E2
data EbeatsTime
EbeatsTime :: Integer -> Ebeats -> EbeatsTime

-- | Modified Julian Day, but not typed as such so that we can define a
--   different <a>show</a>
days :: EbeatsTime -> Integer
ebeats :: EbeatsTime -> Ebeats
getEbeatsTime :: IO EbeatsTime
getEbeats :: IO Ebeats
toEbeatsTime :: UTCTime -> EbeatsTime
toEbeats :: UTCTime -> Ebeats
ebeatsToSeconds :: Ebeats -> Fixed E2
secondsToEbeats :: Fixed E2 -> Ebeats
diffEbeatsTime :: EbeatsTime -> EbeatsTime -> Ebeats

-- | addEbeatsTime a b = a + b -- Like addUTCTime.
addEbeatsTime :: Ebeats -> EbeatsTime -> EbeatsTime
instance Eq Ebeats
instance Ord Ebeats
instance Eq EbeatsTime
instance Ord EbeatsTime
instance Num Ebeats
instance Show EbeatsTime
instance Show Ebeats
